reviews.review_msg: This class was not a positive experience overall, but that was mostly due to the crappy assignments and porrly written tests. John has excellent lecturing and presenting abilities. The time, however was wasted in explaining computer programs and not course material which could have been interesting

loved the class loved his method. Print out the notes before class, he lectures and you fill in more info to the notes. Didnt even need the text, altho helped with essays. Easy exams, simple grade breakdown, easy to pull up gpa!
Best TM ever, 1 day max turn around on papers. Friendly and helpful.
